title: A Boss' Last Ditch Effort

fields.name: - When played, do the following list of actions in order:
fields.value:
- Clear all positive effects (statuses, ğŸ˜ƒ, ğŸ’µ, etc.)

 - Discard any <:trinket:1141745128898310144>, ğŸ’, <:wild:1106237191388143838>, <:hyrulean:1119825670864916551>, âš¡, ğŸŒŠ, ğŸ¦, <:rulebreaker:1120899966555127899>, <:ex:1118578840529281114>, <:holy:1120560132150022184>, ğŸ†”, <:void:1119855990263775283>, <:discordian:1119395375896338512>, <:wild:1106237191388143838>, ğŸ², <:outsiders:1108173904062722118>, <:colorless:1106434944261177374>, <:grave:1119394182310670366> and <:slightlylightergreenbutwithalitt:1120008660454744117> cards.
 - Discard any altered, **Phantom**, and **Ethereal** cards.
 - Lose all **Enhance** uses.
 - Go into **Adventure Mode**.
 - Lose all **Spell Slots**.
 - Have 2 **Card Shards** ğŸ”¹.
 - You cannot discard down to winning for 2 turns.
 - Discard down to 2 cards. If you already have less than 2 cards, draw base cards until you have 2.
 - You are **Linked** with a random player.
 - Become **Exposed** for 2 turns.
 - Gain a **Deep Wound** for 2 turns.

fields.name: - When played, do the following list of actions in order (cont.):
fields.value:
- Become **Tipsy**.
 - Cause someone of your choosing to have a total of 10 cards in their hand.

- If you ever have over 6 cards, you are **Destroyed**.
